methods.description: Returns a single Early Day Motion by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Early Day Motion with the ID specified.

methods.description: Returns a list of Early Day Motions

parameters.name: parameters.edmIds
parameters.description: Early Day Motions with an ID in the list provided.

parameters.name: parameters.uINWithAmendmentSuffix
parameters.description: Early Day Motions with an UINWithAmendmentSuffix provided.

parameters.name: parameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: Early Day Motions where the title includes the search term provided.

parameters.name: parameters.currentStatusDateStart
parameters.description: Early Day Motions where the current status has been set on or after the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.currentStatusDateEnd
parameters.description: Early Day Motions where the current status has been set on or before the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.isPrayer
parameters.description: Early Day Motions which are a prayer against a Negative Statutory Instrument.

parameters.name: parameters.memberId
parameters.description: Return Early Day Motions tabled by Member with ID provided.

parameters.name: parameters.includeSponsoredByMember
parameters.description: Include Early Day Motions sponsored by Member specified

parameters.name: parameters.tabledStartDate
parameters.description: Early Day Motions where the date tabled is on or after the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.tabledEndDate
parameters.description: Early Day Motions where the date tabled is on or before the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.statuses
parameters.description: Early Day Motions where current status is in the selected list.

parameters.name: parameters.orderBy
parameters.description: Order results by date tabled, title or signature count. Default is date tabled.

parameters.name: parameters.skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0.

parameters.name: parameters.take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 25, maximum is 100.

methods.description: Returns a list of oral questions

parameters.name: parameters.answeringDateStart
parameters.description: Oral Questions where the answering date has been set on or after the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.answeringDateEnd
parameters.description: Oral Questions where the answering date has been set on or before the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.questionType
parameters.description: Oral Questions where the question type is the selected type, substantive or topical.

parameters.name: parameters.oralQuestionTimeId
parameters.description: Oral Questions where the question is within the question time with the ID provided

parameters.name: parameters.askingMemberIds
parameters.description: The ID of the member asking the question. Lists of member IDs for each house are available Commons and Lords.

parameters.name: parameters.uINs
parameters.description: The UIN for the question - note that UINs reset at the start of each Parliamentary session.

parameters.name: parameters.answeringBodyIds
parameters.description: Which answering body is to respond. A list of answering bodies can be found here.

parameters.name: parameters.skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0.

parameters.name: parameters.take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 25, maximum is 100.

methods.description: Returns a list of oral question times

parameters.name: parameters.answeringDateStart
parameters.description: Oral Questions Time where the answering date has been set on or after the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.answeringDateEnd
parameters.description: Oral Questions Time where the answering date has been set on or before the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.deadlineDateStart
parameters.description: Oral Questions Time where the deadline date has been set on or after the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.deadlineDateEnd
parameters.description: Oral Questions Time where the deadline date has been set on or before the date provided. Date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: parameters.oralQuestionTimeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the OQT

parameters.name: parameters.answeringBodyIds
parameters.description: Which answering body is to respond. A list of answering bodies can be found here.

parameters.name: parameters.skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0.

parameters.name: parameters.take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 25, maximum is 100.

apiDescription: An API that allows querying all tabled oral and written questions, and motions for the House of Commons.
apiTitle: House of Commons Oral and Written Questions API
